content: bloody eyeballs #darklingsandwhimsicles by margaux rull creativechaosarts this is a pattern for quick to make eyeballs that you can use as table or hanging décors stress toys keychains etc and for the unafraid christmas tree balls with the indicated hook and yarn sizes the eyeball will be approximately 5 -7 cm big difficulty beginner with knowledge of basic crochet stitches magic_ring color changes straight stitches materials 1 yarn worsted red heart super saver white black and your preferred colors 2 crochet hook 2 5mm-3mm 3 lightweight red yarn or red embroidery thread 4 tapestry needle 5 fiberfill abbreviations r = round increase = increase st =stitch decrease = decrease slip_stitch = slip_stitch 1 single_crochet = single_crochet = repeat stitches in brackets the given number of chain = chain times = total number of stitches let s begin with the pupil r1 with black start 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 r2 increase 6x 12 slip_stitch in the first st of r2 cut inner iris change to a light color slip_stitch into any of the sts in r2 r3 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st increase single_crochet in the next st increase 5x 18 slip_stitch in the first st cut outer iris change to a dark color slip_stitch into any of the sts in r3 r4 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in the next st increase single_crochet in the next 2 sts increase 5x 24 slip_stitch in the first st cut schlera change to white or glow-in-the-dark yarn slip_stitch into any of the sts in r4 r5 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in the next 2 sts increase single_crochet in the next 3 sts increase 5x 30 r6 single_crochet in the next 4 sts increase 6x 36 2 r7 r10 single_crochet in each st around 36 r11 single_crochet in the next 4 sts decrease 6x 30 r12 single_crochet in the next 3 sts decrease 6x 24 stuff as you go r13 single_crochet in the next 2 sts decrease 6x 18 r14 single_crochet in the next st decrease 6x 12 r15 decrease 6x 6 close off fasten_off leaving around 25 cm of tail for sewing make that eye pop with a wee bit of a sparkle with tapestry needle weave the white yarn tail in and out of the rounds until you reach r4 or the outer iris make 2 overlapping straight stitches over the outer and inner iris …but also make it creepy add blood vessels with tapestry needle and long red yarn or embroidery thread weave straight vertical and diagonal stitches all around the schlera forming vs ys x and various random shapes weave in the end if you have purchased doll patterns that include patterns of accessories from my shop before like hats ribbons cat ears horns etc you can use these to decorate the eyeballs and come up with your own unique designs put your creativity out there in social media and tag me in ig and use #darklingsandwhimsicles for dolls
